subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Williams’s 6-2, 4-6, 7-5 victory, her 10th straight semifinal win at the Key Biscayne, Fla., event, came a month after a knee injury prevented her from facing Halep at Indian Wells.
snippet: Williams’s 6-2, 4-6, 7-5 victory, her 10th straight semifinal win at the Key Biscayne, Fla., event, came a month after a knee injury prevented her from facing Halep at Indian Wells.
